content:
Copy .
Office Memorandum . UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT
DATE
July 23,1962
U.S. GBL: /A-0687768, States Marine Idnes, Inc., 8/L Nos. 7 and 22 Taipel BSAID A-7
Our message Seoul USAID A-123 dated June 15, 1962, requested UB AID Kores to consign the three Toyota buses to CUSA, Taipei, Taiwan. It is noted that the Chevrolet Pick-Up vehicles and the busss have been consigned to US AID/China, c/o American Escassy, Chine. (The subject B/Ls Are self explanatory, two buses and two Pick-Up vehicles shipped on the SS "Buckeye State" w.d. one bus on the SS "Steel Recorder" ). In view of the fsot that all the vehicles have boor consignedate ME A ID/C 16 you think it is possible for the Mission to clear upon arrival and then transfer the buses to CUBA, or would you prefer that we udvise US AID Koren that the busen hever tenn Incorrectly consigned request them to amend the present documents to show the Street cona! men! It will Meer ind arrange transfer 5 5:19 "[1] you kindly advise your renotion. 140.112.213.82
Tom, Buses were endorsed to JCRR who cleared them through customs.
MF 7/27/62
√Ä
2 216 Academia Historica
35

Our message Seoul USAID A-123 dated June 15, 1962, requested UB AID Kores to consign the three Toyota buses to CUSA, Taipei, Taiwan. (The subject B/Ls Are self explanatory, two buses and two Pick-Up vehicles shipped on the SS "Buckeye State" w.d. one bus on the SS "Steel Recorder" ).
